title: His Majesties letter to His Excellency the Lord General Monck, to be communicated to the officers of the army brought to His Excellency from His Majesties Court at the Hague, by Sir Thomas Clarges.
author: Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
notes: "Rochester, May 24. 1660. I do appoint Mr. Henry Muddiman to cause this letter to be forthwith printed and published. George Monck."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
